org.keycloak.federation.sssd

Class SSSDFederationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.keycloak.federation.sssd.SSSDFederationProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CredentialInputUpdater, CredentialInputUpdater.Streams, CredentialInputValidator, Provider, ImportedUserValidation, UserLookupProvider, UserLookupProvider.Streams, UserStorageProvider

    public class SSSDFederationProvider
extends Object
implements UserStorageProvider, UserLookupProvider.Streams, CredentialInputUpdater.Streams, CredentialInputValidator, ImportedUserValidation
    SPI provider implementation to retrieve data from SSSD and authenticate against PAM
    Version:
    $Revision: 1 $
    Author:
    Bruno Oliveira
